1459620.name: FADE - THE FIRST CHAPTER Demo
1459620.description: This demo contains a short temporary starting quest, alongside a few playable quests. Overtime the demo shall be fleshed out further to provide more content to test out while the full game is under development. The estimated playtime for this demo is 1-2 hours based on your skill.
1459620.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
